$interpreted: Misa: ...There are more here...how many did the High Priest make...?
Joshua: More than you can imagine. Let's go.
Misa: It's so dark here...are you sure this is the way?
Joshua: Relax. I've been here many times.
Misa: Joshua, you...why did you come here? Everyone from the orphanage? Are they all doing okay?
Misa: Joshua?
Joshua: ...I just want to ask you one thing, Misa.
Joshua: When you became Holy Maiden and left the orphanage, why did you never come back to see us?
Misa: Eh?
Misa: I-I...the High Priest said he'd take care of you.
Misa: I just wanted to focus on my prayers, for all the people of the Desert Kingdom...
Joshua: ...Hehe, I see.
Joshua: Compared to an orphanage, being able to save a whole country sounds more appealing to you, am I right?
Misa: That's not what I meant! I can save everybody! But I have to get the medicine first! Where is it?
Joshua: ...Straight ahead.
Misa: Ahead?
Misa: Oh, this...feels so creepy...
Misa: And the odor...
Joshua: This is the laboratory where Devious carried out his transformations.
Misa: You mean this is where my medicine is stored?
Joshua: ......
Misa: Speak!
Joshua: ......
Misa: If you don't tell me, I'll find it myself!
Misa: No...what about here?
Misa: No...
Misa: What...what is that noise?
Joshua: ...Look out!
Misa: Th-Those monsters! Why do they keep appearing!?
Joshua: ...Because they recognize you.
Joshua: You don't recognize them?
Misa: I have nothing to do with these monsters! Leave! Stop bothering me!
Joshua: Stop.
Misa: What are you doing!? Didn't you take me here to find my medicine!? Can't you see that this monster is about to attack us!?
Joshua: ...There is no medicine. The one I just gave you, it was also the last one that I had.
Misa: What...no...no!!!
Joshua: Yes. That's the truth. I tricked you into coming here.
Misa: Why!?
Joshua: Because you should have come here! We've been waiting for you to return!
Joshua: Look at them! Look at the monster in front of you! Whose eyes are those? You really don't recognize them!?
Misa: ...Oh my...
Misa: ...Louie's left eye...and...Wendy's right...
Misa: My Snake God...*gags*...
Joshua: Do you remember? That "strange illness" they had?
Misa: I...
Joshua: That wasn't an illness, it was just a side effect of one of Devious' experiments.
Joshua: After you left, Devious became more intense, feeding heavy drugs to the remaining children of the orphanage.
Joshua: Trying to find someone like you, a second "miracle".
Misa: No, no, no...I don't believe it. The High Priest said that everyone at the orphanage was doing well...
Joshua: Aren't you curious why my face looks like this?
Misa: No...you too, the side effects...
Joshua: Most of the children couldn't handle the effects of the medicine and died. The rest, like me, became severely deformed.
Joshua: Devious simply gave up on the entire batch. He didn't want us.
Misa: ...Didn't want you?
Joshua: He found new children to experiment on.
Joshua: Us that failed, we became human fertilizer for future batches. He snatched us up, transformed us, cut us up, pieced us back together...
Misa: ...*sob*...
Misa: ...*gag*...*gag*...
Joshua: I was the only one that was lucky enough to escape. I'm the only survivor.
Misa: ...So all of you...
Joshua: After the transformation, we had no consciousness of our own.
Joshua: If any emotion remained, I'm afraid...all that remained was hate...
Joshua: ...for what they saw last...this lab...and for you.
Misa: Me...?
Joshua: Misa, do you remember what you said when you left the orphanage?
Misa: ..."The Snake God only chose me, because you all aren't pious enough"...
Misa: ...My Snake God...no...that's not what I meant, I never thought...

Joshua: It's too late. I started that conflict between you and the army on purpose, to make the throne think that the Shrine wanted to betray them. 
That way, they'll no longer tolerate you.
Misa: You want to eradicate the Shrine completely...?
Joshua: That pales in comparison to what Devious did to us!
Joshua: As for you, you should rot in this filthy sewer with the rest of us!
Joshua: (In the end...I still am unable to bring myself to look...let me close my eyes...)
Misa: ...*cough*...*cough*...!
Misa: I...will save everybody!
Joshua: (Misa——!)
Joshua: (No, the effects should have worn off! Do you still have some on you...?)
Misa: I know you've suffered immensely. Waiting here, constantly being tortured...
Joshua: ...Tranquilty...and peace...
Misa: I don't know if everything about the Snake God and Goddess is fake.
Misa: But, if...there's anything! If anyone, anything hears my prayers——please help me, grant them the peace that they deserve.
Joshua: ...The light...is so warm...
Joshua: Misa, after all this, you're still...
Misa: Joshua!

Model.Text: ...There are more here...how many did the High Priest make...?
More than you can imagine. Let's go.
It's so dark here...are you sure this is the way?
Relax. I've been here many times.
Joshua, you...why did you come here? Everyone from the orphanage? Are they all doing okay?
Joshua?
...I just want to ask you one thing, Misa.
When you became Holy Maiden and left the orphanage, why did you never come back to see us?
Eh?
I-I...the High Priest said he'd take care of you.
I just wanted to focus on my prayers, for all the people of the Desert Kingdom...

Stop.

He found new children to experiment on.
Us that failed, we became human fertilizer for future batches. He snatched us up, transformed us, cut us up, pieced us back together...
I was the only one that was lucky enough to escape. I'm the only survivor.

After the transformation, we had no consciousness of our own.
If any emotion remained, I'm afraid...all that remained was hate...

Misa, do you remember what you said when you left the orphanage?
..."The Snake God only chose me, because you all aren't pious enough"...
...My Snake God...no...that's not what I meant, I never thought...

It's too late. I started that conflict between you and the army on purpose, to make the throne think that the Shrine wanted to betray them. 
That way, they'll no longer tolerate you.
You want to eradicate the Shrine completely...?
That pales in comparison to what Devious did to us!
As for you, you should rot in this filthy sewer with the rest of us!
(In the end...I still am unable to bring myself to look...let me close my eyes...)
...*cough*...*cough*...!
I...will save everybody!
(Misa——!)
(No, the effects should have worn off! Do you still have some on you...?)
I know you've suffered immensely. Waiting here, constantly being tortured...
...Tranquilty...and peace...
I don't know if everything about the Snake God and Goddess is fake.
But, if...there's anything! If anyone, anything hears my prayers——please help me, grant them the peace that they deserve.
...The light...is so warm...
Misa, after all this, you're still...
Joshua!

He snatched us up, transformed us, cut us up, pieced us back together...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_17_006","SpeakerName":"Misa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0154","IconName":"h0154s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...*sob*...","sfxName":"h0154sx_story_013","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_17_007","SpeakerName":"Misa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0154","IconName":"h0154s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...*gag*...*gag*...","sfxName":"h0154sx_story_008","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_17_008","SpeakerName":"Joshua","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3354c3","IconName":"h3354c3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I was the only one that was lucky enough to escape. I'm the only survivor.","sfxName":"human_male_young_royal_12_ver1","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_18_000","SpeakerName":"Misa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0154","IconName":"h0154s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...So all of you...","sfxName":"h0154sx_battle_hit_01_1_normal","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_18_001","SpeakerName":"Joshua","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3354c3","IconName":"h3354c3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"After the transformation, we had no consciousness of our own.","sfxName":"human_male_young_royal_01","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_18_002","SpeakerName":"Joshua","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3354c3","IconName":"h3354c3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"If any emotion remained, I'm afraid...all that remained was hate...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_18_003","SpeakerName":"Joshua","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3354c3","IconName":"h3354c3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...for what they saw last...this lab...and for you.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_19_000","SpeakerName":"Misa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0154","IconName":"h0154s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Me...?","sfxName":"h0154sx_story_023","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_19_001","SpeakerName":"Joshua","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3354c3","IconName":"h3354c3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Misa, do you remember what you said when you left the orphanage?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_20_000","SpeakerName":"Misa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0154","IconName":"h0154s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...\"The Snake God only chose me, because you all aren't pious enough\"...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_21_000","SpeakerName":"Misa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0154","IconName":"h0154s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...My Snake God...no...that's not what I meant, I never thought...","sfxName":"h0154sx_story_026","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_21_001","SpeakerName":"Joshua","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3354c3","IconName":"h3354c3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It's too late. I started that conflict between you and the army on purpose, to make the throne think that the Shrine wanted to betray them. \nThat way, they'll no longer tolerate you.","sfxName":"human_male_young_royal_05_ver1","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_21_002","SpeakerName":"Misa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0154","IconName":"h0154s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You want to eradicate the Shrine completely...?","sfxName":"h0154sx_story_004_ver1","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_21_003","SpeakerName":"Joshua","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3354c3","IconName":"h3354c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That pales in comparison to what Devious did to us!","sfxName":"human_male_young_royal_07","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_21_004","SpeakerName":"Joshua","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3354c3","IconName":"h3354c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"As Waiting here, constantly being tortured...","sfxName":"h0154sx_story_016_ver1","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Joshua","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3354c3","IconName":"h3354c3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Tranquilty...and peace...","sfxName":"human_male_young_royal_04","sfxVolume":0.7},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_26_001","SpeakerName":"Misa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0154","IconName":"h0154s5_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I don't know if everything about the Snake God and Goddess is fake.","sfxName":"h0154sx_battle_attack_01_1_normal","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_26_002","SpeakerName":"Misa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0154","IconName":"h0154s5_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But, if...there's anything! If anyone, anything hears my prayers\u2014\u2014please help me, grant them the peace that they deserve.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Joshua","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3354c3","IconName":"h3354c3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...The light...is so warm...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_27_001","SpeakerName":"Misa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0154","IconName":"h0154s5_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Joshua","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3354c3","IconName":"h3354c3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Misa, after all this, you're still...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0154_004_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Misa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0154","IconName":"h0154s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Joshua!","sfxName":"h0154sx_battle_hit_01_2_med","sfxVolume":0.8}]}
